UNIWA disposes of a significant number of research laboratories that serve the educational and research needs of the Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs in all the covered scientific fields. Research Laboratories play a key role for the research conducted at the University.

The main objective of the laboratories is to develop scientific research, while simultaneously producing knowledge in their corresponding fields of expertise in which they operate.

Each laboratory operates under the umbrella of the Department or School to which it belongs, while supporting the educational and research activities of each department in the most modern and efficient way.

Modern and specialized equipment, as well as experienced scientific and technical staff, help in the best possible way, both in supporting undergraduate and postgraduate teaching as well as in conducting high-level research.

All research laboratories are affiliated with GUNET (Greek Universities Network) and are equipped with up-to-date teaching equipment (computers, Internet access, video projector, interactive boards).
